entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gameti
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -40.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
